messages.message:
Hi team,

Do we actually have this illustration in our design system? Used in this mock (https://www.figma.com/design/UE91esgJlmFXpvAH62vRTh/Case-Management?node-id=1163-196075&t=NDkxhO0QNWo9LhQ5-0)

I don't see it in our Pollen storybook

i think this exists under `apps/src/aihub/shared/assets/illustrations/personHoldingArrow.svg`

see how some components use `ILLUSTRATIONS.PersonHoldingArrow`!

Looks like its also used under `ILLUSTRATIONS.NoFields` . Thank you @Xindi Xu :slightly_smiling_face:

https://github.com/instabase/instabase/blob/7b28d960b783d3690b5991431a6089363e5a25[â€¦]/js/webpacked/apps/src/aihub/components/FieldList/FieldList.tsx (https://github.com/instabase/instabase/blob/7b28d960b783d3690b5991431a6089363e5a2506/webserver/shared/src/js/webpacked/apps/src/aihub/components/FieldList/FieldList.tsx#L140)
ah, `PersonHoldingArrow` is a much better name! We should consolidate :smile:
Looks like `ILLUSTRATIONS.NoFields` is only in 3 places, I'll do that as a part of my PR
